name: CGEventFlags
desc: Constants that indicate the modifier key state at the time an event is created, as well as other event-related states.

items.name: static var maskAlphaShift: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that the Caps Lock key is down for a keyboard, mouse, or flag-changed event.

items.name: static var maskShift: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that the Shift key is down for a keyboard, mouse, or flag-changed event.

items.name: static var maskControl: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that the Control key is down for a keyboard, mouse, or flag-changed event.

items.name: static var maskAlternate: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that the Alt or Option key is down for a keyboard, mouse, or flag-changed event.

items.name: static var maskCommand: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that the Command key is down for a keyboard, mouse, or flag-changed event.

items.name: static var maskHelp: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that the Help modifier key is down for a keyboard, mouse, or flag-changed event. This key is not present on most keyboards, and is different than the Help key found in the same row as Home and Page Up.

items.name: static var maskSecondaryFn: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that the Fn (Function) key is down for a keyboard, mouse, or flag-changed event. This key is found primarily on laptop keyboards.

items.name: static var maskNumericPad: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Identifies key events from the numeric keypad area on extended keyboards.

items.name: static var maskNonCoalesced: CGEventFlags
items.desc: Indicates that mouse and pen movement events are not being coalesced.
